docs.title: Basically
docs.text: A versatile template designed for creating and managing gameplay modes.

docs.title: Dependencies
docs.text:
The current template leverages a few useful dependencies that can significantly streamline the creation of new projects:

  • Cmdr - provides an intuitive way to set up user entry points for the main facets of your program.
  • ProfileStore - offers a reliable mechanism for storing data in your database.
  • lua-promise - ensures robust asynchronous functionality.
